person.persName: Montreville G. Wilson (Hickman, Kentucky, brick mason)

body.p: Hickman, Kentucky, brick mason. Tennessee native. Married Catherine McManus Wilson on October 28, 1854. Father of Montreville T. Wilson, William J. Wilson, Mary E. Wilson, and Susan A. Wilson. Master brick mason in Hickman in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 110; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Bond County, Greenville, p. 23; Tennessee, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900, Ancestry, Shelby County, Tennessee, October 28, 1854.
